text.text: Automate Billing with WHMCS Integrated Module

Generating invoices, creating orders for clients, collecting payments and keeping records of recurring payments, is a tedious work to do, especially when the services you offer have the potential to grow exponentially like SMS service. MumaraSMS+ gets you covered with its WHMCS integrated module for auto invoicing and billing management.
Install both themes on a site with Gatsby Theme Composition. It's a perfect match.
CMS Integrated: Strapi, Contentful, Sanity, Netlify CMS and MDX
Mumara supports cloud-based or self-hosted CMSes for writing blog posts.
Mumara delivers maximum functionality with value-added serverless APIs.

Welcome to Mumara App Store, it started after the immense success of the Self-Hosted edition of Mumara Email, largely accepted worldwide.

Instead of separately managing clients’ registration in MumaraSMS+ and in the billing system, get WHMCS integrated module to work this for you automatically. Once your client registers and subscribes to a package, it doesn’t only create a profile within MumaraSMS+ but also takes client details to create a profile within WHMCS.

You don’t need to create manual orders anymore. Once the client subscribes to a package that exists both in MumaraSMS+ and in you billing system, it automatically generates the order and sends the invoice to the client by appropriately printing the order details, i.e. client name, package subscribed, due amount and such.

It gives you bunch of options for payment collection and processing through the integrated payment gateways including PayPal, Stripe etc. You moreover can collect payment through credit card or opting for bank transfer, everything with ease and convenience.

Integration with WHMCS has made it possible for you to seamlessly work with different pricing models, including the most dynamically driven ones like Topup plan and others like credit based pricing plans or monthly subscription packages.
